text: Brachychilus chevrolatii is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by James Thomson in 1868. It is known from Chile.BioLib.cz - Brachychilus chevrolatii. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1868 Category:Beetles of South America Category:Endemic fauna of Chile Category:Arthropods of Chile
title: Brachychilus chevrolatii
